channel.title: FIX YOUR RANGE! It calcs from the wrong bonus look here to fix
channel.description:
This has been anoying me for ages the fact that it doesnt calc off your range bonus. I found the problem in CalculateRange()
The person who made it must of forgotten that arrays start with 0. So look for [code]CalculateRange() {[/code]
in there you'll see [code]int RangeBonus = playerBonus[5]; //Range Bonus[/code]
Because arrays include 0 that is the stab bonus. so people just wear barrows and range over 70.. So to fix this change it to the actual range attack bonus.
[code]int RangeBonus = playerBonus[4]; //Range Bonus[/code]
There i hope you people enjoy this because this is ruining pking on alot of servers.

in there you’ll see

int RangeBonus = playerBonus[5]; //Range Bonus

Because arrays include 0 that is the stab bonus. so people just wear barrows and range over 70… So to fix this change it to the actual range attack bonus.
